Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Montreal in 2019...
Traded from Montreal to New York on 3/2/2019 (Going to NY: C Steven Winer. Going to MON: 3B Kenneth Cook)...
Injured on 8/16/2019 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2022, off Branden Chow (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2022, off Rodney Schloss (CIN)...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2023, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 8/1/2023...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2023...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,107,143 through salary arbitration...
